titles.title: A bill for the relief of James C. Pope.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 9/8/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual representing salary not received after his dismissal from the Office of General Aviation of the Federal Aviation Administration for whistle-blowing activities. Provides for the calculation of his retirement annuities.
